synopsis.text:
Evil has awakened in the form of the Aragami, a race of alien plant-like creatures that have set their sights on conquering the world. The only hope for humanity lies in the hands of Momiji, an ordinary girl who discovers she is the last descendant of the powerful Kushinada clan. With the ability to sense and defeat the Aragami, Momiji must embrace her destiny and make the ultimate sacrifice to save the world.

Joining Momiji in her fight is the TAC, a government agency dedicated to stopping the Aragami threat. Among its ranks is Mamoru Kusanagi, a young man with a personal vendetta against the Aragami who has been infused with their blood. Together, this unlikely team must work together to defeat the Aragami and prevent a war between good and evil.

As the Aragami grow stronger and more ruthless, Momiji and her allies must face their fears and embrace their powers. But will it be enough to stop the Aragami and save humanity from destruction? Only time will tell in this thrilling adventure filled with action, suspense, and romance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
